fields.label: Theme order number (numar de ordine tema)
fields.name: theme_order_number
fields.instructions: Add theme order (adauga numarul de ordine al temei)

fields.label: Display Number (Numar de afisat)
fields.name: theme_number
fields.instructions: Add theme number. Numarul temei care va fi afisat in pagina, exemple 1-2

fields.label: Theme steps (Adauga etapele temei)
fields.name: theme_steps
fields.instructions: Click "Add New" to add theme steps. Adauga etapele temei.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Feel free to format the text (Poti trece textul in linie noua)

sub_fields.label: Add plus (+) before paragraphs (adauga + in fata paragrafelor)
sub_fields.name: add_plus

sub_fields.label: Split variants A/B (selecteaza variant A sau B)
sub_fields.name: split_variants
sub_fields.instructions: Each variant should follow this format [V1/V2], example: [variant1/variant2]

sub_fields.label: Add dropdown game (adauga dropdown cu cuvinte)
sub_fields.name: add_dropdown_game
sub_fields.instructions: Adauga lista derulanta cu variante pentru cuvinte cheie. Marcheaza {cuvantele} cheie.

sub_fields.label: Add table boders (adauga chenar la tabele)
sub_fields.name: add_table_boders

sub_fields.label: Background color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Set background color. (Seteaza culoarea de fundal)

sub_fields.label: Options
sub_fields.name: options
sub_fields.instructions: Add options with feedback (Adauga optiuni text + feedback)

sub_fields.label: Featured Image
sub_fields.name: featured_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add featured image. Curiosity will open on image click.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: Add text before the items list

sub_fields.label: Text fields
sub_fields.name: text_fields
sub_fields.instructions: How many text fields to display ?

sub_fields.label: Text color (culoare text)
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions: Set text area color. Seteaza culoarea textului.

layout_66eedd3231afb.name: choose_multiple
layout_66eedd3231afb.label: Choose From Text List (alege din lista text)

sub_fields.label: Text content
sub_fields.name: text_content
sub_fields.instructions: Use [] to place variants inside text

layout_66f98a2d688f7.name: drag_items_to_list
layout_66f98a2d688f7.label: Drag Items To List (trage itemi in lista)

layout_673a02bf7821b.name: boxes_with_text_game
layout_673a02bf7821b.label: Boxes with Text (casete cu text + textarea)

sub_fields.label: Print? (Printeaza)
sub_fields.name: print

sub_fields.label: Max items allowed (nr de itemi acceptati)
sub_fields.name: max_items_allowed
